title: Forecast Janna gone from collection
body:
I've already made a post on twitter to Riot Support but maybe this might get some more attention. 

I went to play a Janna game today and when I went to switch from Star Guardian to Forecast I see it wasn't available for me to select anymore. It was gifted to me by a friend on the 24th of March and I was able to used it up until this morning after I logged on. Any help figuring this out would be much appreciated, I really loved that skin!

replies.body: I pulled up your account to see if I could find out what exactly happened with your Forecast Janna skin. It looks like there was something strange going on with the gift you got, so reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to go more in detail there.
